constitutionalsection.catchline: Terms; reference to members of the Legislature to include appointed and elected members.
constitutionalsection.para: Whenever they shall appear in this Constitution, the terms members of the Legislature, elected members of the Legislature, or similar terms referring to the members of the Legislature, shall include appointed and elected members of the Legislature.

source.para: Transferred by Constitutional Convention, 1919-1920, art. XVII, sec. 1;
